title: Who is Elon Musk? What work does he do? - Quora

response.answer_text: Who is Elon Musk? What work does he do? There are sometimes moments where I don’t have a clue about some topic, person, whatever. Do you know what I do? I type “Google <topic>” into the search window of it. Occasionally, if it looks that it might be a very common topic or a known person, I type in “Wikipedia <topic>”. I suggest you do the same.At least this is what currently children are taught in primary school. There are a few options: you might be already too old and you didn’t have computers and internet when you attended school,or you really skipped some very important classes in your school.But in either case, I don’t know how you managed to post a question on Quora.there is a third, although less probable option, you have some mental disorder and you forgot how to use Google.I suggest you urgently see the doctor.
